payload.message: Generate daily health summary for the past 24 hours. Include: 1) Channel health stats (Telegram uptime, any timeouts). 2) JoJo responsiveness metrics. 3) Gateway uptime and restarts. 4) System metrics (memory, disk, sessions). 5) Any interventions logged in health-logs/interventions.log. 6) Security status. 7) Recommendations. Save report to reports/daily-YYYY-MM-DD.md and deliver summary to Aaron.
